pli-tv-bi-vb-pj5:1.11: kuṭhāriṃ → kuddālaṃ (bj); kudhāriṃ (mr); parasuṃ → pharasuṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj5:1.50: santuṭṭhassa → santuṭṭhiyā (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); asantuṭṭhitāya → asantuṭṭhiyā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); asantuṭṭhatāya (sya-all)
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj5:2.3.10: Paṭhamapārājikaṃ samattaṃ → paṭhamapārājikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (bj, sya-all); bhikkhunīvibhaṅge paṭhamapārājikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
